name: mythosengine
description: An open-source, AI-powered world-building platform for creators

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.migrate:backend: cd backend && uv run alembic revision --autogenerate
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && uv run alembic upgrade head
